Articles.Content:
I'm looking for a complete list of commands variables available for plugin programming. did a lot of searches and all seem to always come back to Community_API_Documentation

which is far from complete or up-to date. I want more info on KSPField (which I only found out about from seeing it in another projects source code)

Thanks

Or you could read the sticky in the Add-on Development forum and find that link (a bit hidden I admit):

http://anatid.github.io/XML-Documentation-for-the-KSP-API/annotated.html

Thanks sarbian. Actually the link in the sticky gave me a 404 error.

Just what I was looking for.
